name: Zero email™
data:
Zero email™ A better way to work

New communication and collaboration tools have emerged, offering
alternatives to email, and making it much less relevant. Open, multi-platform communication is fast becoming the norm – and it’s commonplace for content to be expressed in multiple ‘dimensions’ at once.

There is now a stronger focus on social networks among people who share business interests and activities. Group communities form the central information and communication hub for different topics, and work is done more quickly and to a higher standard. Blogs, wikis, instant messaging, and social media tools, to name a few, are all in common usage in our private lives and are starting to enter the professional environment.

However, they are rarely properly integrated in the professional sphere to support a natural flow of work.

Taking advantage of new tools

 

Our Zero email™ offering changes all that. Zero email™ is not an ambition in itself, but more a side effect of smarter usage of the collaboration tools available today. Based on our own experience, we have created an approach which will help you transform the way employees communicate and collaborate.

We aim to encourage innovation, ensure a more agile enterprise, and speed up time to market for new services and products. Our inimitable new offering will allow you to effectively control information overflow and introduce much-needed transparency into information management.

Looking beyond email

 

At Atos, we believe that Zero email™ is the best managerial concept to drive our organization to become a truly social organisation, fully adopting the technologies of the future workplace. Working with you we will help make collaboration tools the cornerstone of your IT landscape, helping define the evolutionary path for your business, based on solid objectives and a strong business case. Collaboration is about people and, as the workforce evolves, so will the expectations of your employees.

We understand this and as a result every aspect of our solution is designed with the user in mind. Only by doing this can we deliver the full benefit of collaboration and give your people the tools they need to give your business long-term competitive advantage.

name: Strategy Solutions
data:
Solutions that help evolve our clients’ business models from a Firm of The Past to a Firm of The Future

Today’s rapidly changing business environment calls for businesses that are resilient to rapidly changing environments – such as in nature, where waste is food, where consumption is beneficial, where the focus is optimising rather than maximising, where relationships are synergistic.

In our view, The Firm of the Future will be a business inspired by nature. It is collaborative, decentralised and multifunctional. It is adaptive, responsive and resilient. Furthermore, it plays a positive role in the ecosystem with a focus on value creation, rather than value extraction.

The Firm of the Future is an organisation more akin to a dynamic living organism which thrives within ever-changing business, socio-economic and environmental systems. The firm of the future is also one that is:

 

  • Open to radical transformation using the catalysts of education, innovation, inspiration and collaboration
  • Encouraging synergies across its business ecosystem, engaging with multiple stakeholders in an open, transparent way and where common values create connections
  • Harnessing the power of social networks, using crowd sourcing, co-creation, transparent branding and values-based leadership for differentiation
  • Aiming at zero-emissions through innovation, cradle-to-cradle and ecological thinking

It is our belief that those organisations which re-shape themselves using nature’s wisdom will flourish through the enormous opportunities these volatile times bring. It is our belief that the Firm of the Future is a Business Inspired by Nature.

Atos has a world-leading partnership with BCI – Biomimicry for Creative Innovation, which seeks to use Nature’s wisdom to help our clients’ organisations become Businesses Inspired By Nature. name: Infrastructure Solutions
data:
Solutions that embed sustainable platforms, infrastructure and technologies

Energy consuming IT estates are growing, and more resources are being used in the manufacture, distribution, and running of IT equipment.

Fundamental to running an efficient, adaptive, resilient and effective organisation is ensuring that the infrastructure upon which the organisation operates is sustainable, open and secure.

Here Atos’ Ambition Carbon Neutral Programme forms the main element of our support for clients in their efforts to reach Carbon excellence and covers three key areas:

 

  • Carbon Assessment and strategy development
  • Carbon reduction programme and improvement areas (transformation & recurring services)
  • Carbon measurement (dashboards)

Once transformation has taken place, Atos is able to take over the running of a client’s infrastructure in the most sustainable and efficient way. Here the focus is on three key services:

 

  • Adaptive Workplace : A complete menu of transformation and recurring workplace services based on an architecture that is optimised for your Green IT requirements and which will help you realise significant productivity gains.
  • Data Centre Services : Atos owns and operates more than 40 data centres worldwide, from which we deliver most of our recurring IT services. We can also optimise your data centers based on your requirements, whether these are predominantly or only partly sustainable IT related.
  • Cloud Infrastructure Solutions : Designed and operated mainly for enterprise clients, Cloud Infrastructure Solutions offer three variants each with different security and resource sharing characteristics, including the necessary transformation services you need.
  • Atos Worldgrid : At the forefront of the technologies which sustain demand side management, the modernisation of transport & distribution networks to significantly reduce costs, as well as the real-time control of utility assets.

Based on the assessment results, we will suggest a roadmap that can be used as a basis to realise the improvements that are deemed possible. We then suggest a transformational strategy with a potential forecast of carbon reductions, coupled with cost savings. We place this in context of your corporate IT maturity and appetite for innovative business solutions, enabling you to assess the business case for change.

name: Business Reinvention
data:
Agility and flexibility through business reinvention

The pace of change in the digital revolution is accelerating every day. No one can stand still.

We’ve all felt the disruptive influence of the digital revolution. It has changed every aspect of our lives from the way we shop, to the way we get our news and entertainment and even in the way we interact with one another.

It hasn’t simply changed how things are done but it has changed what is done and also what people want.

Understanding this is now a way of life isn’t a luxury it is an essential.

We understand how things are changing and have a vision of the future based on our in depth knowledge of digital transformation, Big Data and the Internet of Things.

In every sector we work in we don’t simply do digital for the sake of faster, better and cheaper operations and experience but also for business survival and long-term sustainability. This is about change: being able to change quickly and also chosing the right direction for it.

Embracing the revolution is fundamental to a business’s future in these increasingly fluid and volatile markets. So have you said “Vive la revolution” today?

name: Customer Experience
data:
Better customer experience along every step of the journey

The customer remains king. Within a constantly changing digital landscape this potent statement is key to any organisation today. In the age of consumer choice, your customers will determine your success so they need to be placed right at the heart of your business.  

The question is not “do we?” but “how do we?” and there lies the challenge.

The truth is that as consumers we all want something a bit different from our customer experience: we want the option to speak to another human but we also want choice to manage our business via an app on our mobile whilst on the move.

But what if we can deliver all that but offer even more to give customers an experience they have never had before? An experience that will enhance the way they view an organisation, drive loyalty but also drive efficiency. The art of the possible is here and it lies within the data revolution.

We understand that all great customer journeys begin with knowledge of who your customer is and what they want. We have our very own customer experience lab designed to do just this. Bringing this insight together with the expertise and knowledge to manage and use data will create a customer experience that becomes the beating heart of your organisation.

name: Operational Excellence
data:
Innovative solutions for operational excellence

We understand that running a business can be complicated. Managing business operations can sometimes feel like trying to build a tower from a series of different building blocks of varying shapes and sizes. Each may work effectively alone but that’s not good enough in the digital world: the whole is always more than the sum of its parts.

Carefully managed digital transformation can now find a way to make each of the blocks uniform and glue them together to create a stable and seamless tower. 

From back office through to customer interaction your business must operate seamlessly bringing standardisation and, most importantly, maximising the best in every element of the business.

With access to real-time data and analytics and standardisation across different process we can easily deliver faster, better and cheaper.

But this is not the end of the build.  We know that we must “future proof” what we’ve developed and make it capable of not only withstanding radical business and social change but adapting easily to it.

name: Trust and Compliance
data:
360° trust and compliance every time

One of the biggest challenges of the digital revolution is security. Protection against cyber-threats, maintaining privacy and keeping personal data safe have to be a primary concern for any organisation in both the public and private sector.
 
An important relationship has formed between the individual and those organisations that hold their data. This relationship must be built on trust or it will fail and vital opportunities will be lost.
 
We understand that as opportunities associated with digital transformation have grown, so has risk and organisations who ignore this do so at their peril. It is no exaggeration to say that organisations will live or die by their ability to keep data safely and securely.
 
For this reason, all organisations must actively demonstrate that they can manage data responsibly in order to gain people’s trust.
 
In order to do this a new and constantly evolving level of compliance is needed. We must all embrace this new world and, most importantly, learn how to keep control of it. That is why we build all of our digital solutions within the tight framework of compliance.
 
We have proved that we can keep people’s data safe and every day we work to keep the level of trust we have earned.

name: Mobile Services Solutions
data:
Reliable , fast and cost-effective mobile services solutions

There’s a growing trend for organisations to deploy mobile technology to staff operating in the field such as Engineers, Sales Representatives, Ticket Inspectors, Traffic Wardens etc. The benefits of mobile technology are significant including increased productivity and customer service, reduction in cost and errors, and in many cases revenue growth. However, the technology – which isn’t just the PDA, mobile phone or laptop, it’s also the application residing on the device as well as peripheral items such as printers – can present a significant point of compromise should any part of it fail or be mislaid.

Atos offers high quality fully-managed mobile services solutions, irrespective of the hardware or application we are able to manage every element of any organisation’s mobile wireless estate from hosting and servicing the application through to supporting the hardware.

We have many years’ experience of private and public sector projects where we have tailored the solutions we offer and the way we work down to the finest detail. And we designed, built, deployed, host and service one of the largest and most complex multi-device mobile ticketing solutions in the UK.

We can manage the entire deployment process from purchasing kit to training staff to use it – whether it’s in bulk as part of a major programme, or on an individual basis as part of an ongoing support contract. We provide back-up kit, replace broken or lost hardware within 24 hours and we assess whether broken hardware can/should be repaired and manage its repair and repatriation. And we manage the courier from door-to-door to ensure pick-up/delivery.

We offer first and second line call centre support for applications and hardware and we have the capability to host and service the applications on a mobile device. We also manage periodic servicing of the hardware.

The benefits:

  • Our solution delivers the expertise, processes and economies of scale for a service that is far more efficient and less expensive than most organisations could achieve alone.

  • We reduce the chance of lost revenue and increased operating costs as a result of hardware or application failure through rapid fault resolution and replacement services.

  • We simplify complexity for our clients by providing a single-point-of-contact for the procurement and support of their entire mobile technology needs.

  • We leverage our strong supplier and manufacturer relationships to secure hardware at costs and service levels that our clients could not achieve alone. And we can guarantee supply as part of an ongoing contract.

name: Procurement Services
data:
Focus through partnering

Market and financial pressures are leading CxOs to call on best-practice procurement methodologies to create sustainable value, either to improve profits or as fuel for growth. As a consequence, skilled resources are required to specialise on core activities often leaving the spend tail or indirect categories to be worked on as and when possible.

Whilst there are several strategies available to the CPO or Procurement Director to extract value from the procurement lifecycle outsourcing can be a source of direct benefits such as cost savings and efficiency gains, and indirect benefits like access to category expertise and skills transfer, all of which deliver fast benefits realisation.

Atos offers an end-to-end service to help our clients derive maximum value from procurement outsourcing. Our award-winning procurement solutions range from strategic consultancy through to fully-managed services.

Our services are structured to address each point of avoidable cost in the procurement lifecycle from competitively negotiated pricing to minimising transaction costs. They work comprehensively as a suite, or independently as discrete modules.

 

 

 

 

Our procurement solutions deliver significant cost-savings and process improvement to our clients, who benefit from:

Why choose Atos?

We have a wealth of experience in delivering procurement outsourcing programmes in the private and public sector, helping our clients to reduce their procurement costs on average by 8%-18% and in one-off instances in excess of 30%.

Our procurement services practitioners have attained, or are working towards attaining Chartered Institute of Purchasing & Supply (CIPS) qualifications and are led by experienced procurement consultants and managers.

We have extensive relationships with some of the world’s leading manufacturers and suppliers of IT hardware, software and services and we are one of the few BPO service providers that offer a ‘Gain Share’ service model.
